original_text: When someone told me in Ziklag, “Saul is dead”, he thought that he was bringing good news to me. But I took hold of him and I told my men to kill him. That was how I paid him for his good news!
korean_text: 전에 사람이 내게 알리기를 보라 사울이 죽었다 하며 그가 좋은 소식을 전하는 줄로 생각하였어도 내가 그를 잡아 시글락에서 죽여서 그것을 그 소식을 전한 갚음으로 삼았거든

sentences.original_text: When someone told me in Ziklag
he thought that he was bringing good news to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 좋은 소식을 내게 가져오는 것이라고 생각했다

sentences.original_text: But I took hold of him
and I told my men to kill him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 사람들에게 그를 죽이라고 명령했다

sentences.original_text: That was how I paid him for his good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 그의 좋은 소식에 대해 보답한 방식이었다
